message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a range of advanced features and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. For this unique opportunity, I am proposing an initial price of $850000. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how this product can be a valuable addition to your life.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested in your product, $850000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $700000 for it.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. After reviewing your offer, I appreciate your interest and feedback. To move forward, I propose a revised price of $750000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our initial offers and aims to provide a fair value for both parties involved. I hope this proposal aligns better with your budget while still allowing us to achieve a satisfactory outcome.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  $750000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm prepared to pay $725000.  This is a fair price, considering the value I place on the product and the opportunity to work together.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of our discussions, I propose a final offer of $740000 for the product. This price represents a reasonable compromise that acknowledges your concerns while also ensuring a fair return for us. I hope this offer will facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.
